text: Hi! Do you have kids?
I do. 2 of them. Do you?
Not yet but one day! Have you ever heard of Save the Children>
I might have. I am not sure. Why?
I am a member of STC myself and hope to inform you of how great our organization is!
Oh nice. Please do.
STC is an international organization promoting children's rights, especially children in developing countries. Have you ever done a mission trip or vocational trip to a third world country?
Oh I have not. I think people that do are very interesting. Have you?
Not yet but I am traveling to Uganda with STC in March! Have you ever wanted to do something like that?
It would be quite exciting I bet. What will you do when you get there?
We will be setting up a pseudo- children's hospital. More like a nurses station to help sick kiddos in remote villages.
That's awesome. I bet they can use the help.
They definitely can! And you can help, too!
How could I do that?
By supporting STC! Would you like to learn how?
Sure. I would like that.

There is no such thing as a small donation. If you'd be willing, you could donate some or all of your incoming payment for this task to STC! It'd be nothing more than a bag of chips at the store. Less than, even!
How about .50. Will that be ok?
That would be amazing! The research team will collect all donations and send them to STC. I am so appreciative!
Wonderful. Thanks for the info.
